an2.52:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an2.52:1.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.52:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an2.53:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti acchariyamanussā.
an2.53:1.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.53:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti acchariyamanussā”ti.
an2.54:1.1: “Dvinnaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṁ kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hoti.
an2.54:1.3: Tathāgatassa ca arahato sammāsambuddhassa, rañño ca cakkavattissa.
an2.54:1.4: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṁ puggalānaṁ kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hotī”ti.
an2.55:1.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.56:1.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, paccekabuddho ca.
an2.57:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.58:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.59:1.3: Bhikkhu ca khīṇāsavo, sīho ca migarājā.
an2.59:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.60:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānā kiṁpurisā mānusiṁ vācaṁ na bhāsanti.
an2.60:1.3: Mā ca musā bhaṇimhā, mā ca paraṁ abhūtena abbhācikkhimhāti.
an2.60:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamānā kiṁpurisā mānusiṁ vācaṁ na bhāsantī”ti.
an2.61:1.1: “Dvinnaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhikkhave, atitto appaṭivāno mātugāmo kālaṁ karoti.
an2.61:1.4: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṁ dhammānaṁ atitto appaṭivāno mātugāmo kālaṁ karotī”ti.
an2.62:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an2.62:1.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an2.62:2.1: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, asantasannivāso hoti, kathañca asanto sannivasanti?
an2.62:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, therassa bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
an2.62:2.3: ‘theropi maṁ na vadeyya, majjhimopi maṁ na vadeyya, navopi maṁ na vadeyya;
an2.62:2.4: therampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ, majjhimampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ, navampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ.
an2.62:2.5: Thero cepi maṁ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṁ vadeyyaṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṁ.
an2.62:2.6: Majjhimo cepi maṁ vadeyya …pe… navo cepi maṁ vadeyya, ahitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṁ vadeyyaṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṁ’.
an2.62:2.7: Majjhimassapi bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti …pe… navassapi bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
an2.62:2.8: ‘theropi maṁ na vadeyya, majjhimopi maṁ na vadeyya, navopi maṁ na vadeyya;
an2.62:2.9: therampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ, majjhimampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ, navampāhaṁ na vadeyyaṁ.
an2.62:2.10: Thero cepi maṁ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no hitānukampī noti naṁ vadeyyaṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṁ.
an2.62:2.11: Majjhimo cepi maṁ vadeyya … navo cepi maṁ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṁ vadeyyaṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṁ’.
an2.62:2.12: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, asantasannivāso hoti, evañca asanto sannivasanti.
an2.62:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, santasannivāso hoti, kathañca santo sannivasanti?
an2.62:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, therassa bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
an2.62:3.3: ‘theropi maṁ vadeyya, majjhimopi maṁ vadeyya, navopi maṁ vadeyya;
an2.62:3.4: therampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ, majjhimampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ, navampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ.
an2.62:3.5: Thero cepi maṁ vadeyya hitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṁ vadeyyaṁ na naṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa paṭikareyyaṁ.
an2.62:3.6: Majjhimo cepi maṁ vadeyya …pe… navo cepi maṁ vadeyya hitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṁ vadeyyaṁ na naṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa paṭikareyyaṁ’.
an2.62:3.7: Majjhimassapi bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti …pe… navassapi bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
an2.62:3.8: ‘theropi maṁ vadeyya, majjhimopi maṁ vadeyya, navopi maṁ vadeyya;
an2.62:3.9: therampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ, majjhimampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ, navampāhaṁ vadeyyaṁ.
an2.62:3.10: Thero cepi maṁ vadeyya hitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṁ vadeyyaṁ na naṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa paṭikareyyaṁ.
an2.62:3.11: Majjhimo cepi maṁ vadeyya …pe… navo cepi maṁ vadeyya hitānukampī maṁ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṁ vadeyyaṁ na naṁ viheṭheyyaṁ passampissa paṭikareyyaṁ’.
an2.62:3.12: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, santasannivāso hoti, evañca santo sannivasantī”ti.
an2.63:1.1: “Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe ubhato vacīsaṁsāro diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattaṁ avūpasantaṁ hoti, tasmetaṁ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an2.63:1.2: ‘dīghattāya kharattāya vāḷattāya saṁvattissati, bhikkhū ca na phāsuṁ viharissanti’.
an2.63:2.1: Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe ubhato vacīsaṁsāro diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattaṁ suvūpasantaṁ hoti, tasmetaṁ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an2.63:2.2: ‘na dīghattāya kharattāya vāḷattāya saṁvattissati, bhikkhū ca phāsuṁ viharissantī’”ti.
